title: 14-year-old boy accidentally shoots himself in Little Village
content:
A 14-year-old boy accidentally shot himself early Tuesday in the Little Village neighborhood on the Southwest Side.
The boy shot himself in the leg at 2:17 a.m. in the 2800 block of South Central Park, according to Chicago Police.
He was taken in good condition to Saint Anthony Hospital, police said. Additional information was not immediately available.
